page.title: 14THE GHOST OF ASHTON COURT
page.content: The ghost of{ASHTON COURT}is a woman called {ANN SMYTH}who was stabbed when she was young.Now she is supposed to walk across the veranda with the knife in her heart.There are many stories told of this but there are other stories such as a woman with all of the animals in the graves begging for the knife.I looked at a book that has a man that was supposed to see it.This man told of a mail coach and four horses with a coach driver.Nobody knows the truth.Really the mystery still remains.
